titles.title: WE CARE Act
Women's Excellence of Care and Accessibility Review and Evaluation Act
To direct the Secretary of Defense to conduct a comprehensive review of the health care services available for female members of the Armed Forces.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 5/2/2011--Introduced. Women's Excellence of Care and Accessibility Review and Evaluation Act or the WE CARE Act - Directs the Secretary of Defense (DOD) to: (1) conduct a comprehensive review of women-specific health services and treatment available for female members of the Armed Forces, and (2) report review results to the congressional defense committees.
